title: Saturday Studio: Poster Experiments
short_description: Take inspiration from Dan Friedman: Stay Radical and experiment with color and shape to make dynamic poster.
description:
Experiment with shapes and colors to create a dynamic poster image in the second of two Saturday Studio programs inspired by the multi-faceted and revolutionary practice of Dan Friedman.

Showcased in Dan Friedman: Stay Radical, the artist's multidisciplinary practice included not only posters but also books, mixed-media assemblages, and furniture. You can also join us in September to take inspiration from Friedman's distinctive typographies and make a typeface of your own.

Please note that this is an in-person event that takes place at the museum.

In accordance with state and City of Chicago guidelines, visitors to the museum are no longer required to wear masks or provide proof of vaccination. Anyone who would like to continue to wear a mask is welcome to do so. Learn more about our visiting policies and what to expect.

If you have any questions about programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
